    \makeatletter
    % \saveequation{<ID>}{<equation>}
    \newcommand\saveequation[2]{%
      \@namedef{equation@#1}{#2}%
    }

    % \useequation{<ID>}
    \newcommand\useequation[1]{%
      \@nameuse{equation@#1}%
    }
    \makeatother


    %%%%%%%%%% EQUATIONS %%%%%%%%%%
    \saveequation{massenergy}{E = mc^{2}}
